title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4023.3 - Duties of handicapper
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4023.3 - Duties of handicapper

State Regulations

The handicapper shall append to the weights for every
handicap the day and hour from which winners will be liable to a penalty, and
no alteration shall be made after publication except in case of omission, through error, of the name or weight of a horse duly entered, in which cases by
permission of the stewards the omission may be rectified by the
handicapper. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4023.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
